articles.title: Germany's Scholz gets Órban to leave room for decision on Ukraine - Euronews
articles.description: As this month's European Summit draws to a close, German Chancellor Olaf Scholz admitted that it was him who convinced his Hungarian counterpart Viktor Órban to leave the Council room temporarily during discussions on Ukraine - but Scholz noted that this cann…
